text.name: The Knight's Sanctuary
text.desc:
If target has 6+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1
At 3+ [ProtectiveSword], Clash Power +1

text.name: With the Power of Justice
text.desc:
If target has 6+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] At 15+ [BlackTearsAlly], consume 5 [BlackTearsAlly] to deal +15% damage

text.name: With the Power of Justice
text.desc:
If target has 6+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1
Clash Power +1 for every 2 [ProtectiveSword] (max 2)
[WhenUse] At 15+ [BlackTearsAlly], consume 5 [BlackTearsAlly] to deal +15% damage

text.name: Arcana Pierce
text.desc:
If target has 6+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1
Clash Power +1 for every 2 [ProtectiveSword] (max 2)
[WhenUse] At 10+ [BlackTearsAlly], consume up to 20 [BlackTearsAlly]
- Deal +(Stack consumed x 1.5)% damage
[EndSkill] If target is defeated, regain half of [BlackTearsAlly] consumed by this Skill

text.name: Arcana Pierce
text.desc:
If target has 6+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1
Clash Power +1 for every [ProtectiveSword] (max 5)
[WhenUse] At 10+ [BlackTearsAlly], consume up to 20 [BlackTearsAlly]
- Deal +(Stack consumed x 1.5)% damage
- Base Power +1 for every 5 Stack consumed
[EndSkill] If target is defeated, regain half of [BlackTearsAlly] consumed by this Skill
coinDescs: If this unit has [SwordCutwithTear], or consumed it with this Coin, deal +20% damage

text.name: Faded Faith
text.desc:
Final Power +1 for every 3 [Sinking] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Lose 7 SP

text.name: Faded Faith
text.desc:
Final Power +1 for every 3 [Sinking] on target (max 3)
[WhenUse] Lose 7 SP
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Gain 2 [BlackTearsAlly]
- Gain 1 additional [BlackTearsAlly] for every 2 [PenetratingSword] this unit had at Combat Start (max 2)

text.desc:
[WhenUse] Lose 10 SP
[WhenUse] At 15+ [BlackTearsAlly], consume 5 [BlackTearsAlly] to deal +20% damage

text.desc:
Final Power +1 for every 3 [Sinking] on target (max 2)

[WhenUse] At 15+ [BlackTearsAlly], consume 5 [BlackTearsAlly] to deal +20% damage
coinDescs:

[WhenUse] Lose 10 SP
[WhenUse] At 15+ [BlackTearsAlly], consume 5 [BlackTearsAlly] to deal +20% damage

text.desc:

[WhenUse] Lose 15 SP
[WhenUse] At 10+ [BlackTearsAlly], consume up to 20 [BlackTearsAlly]
- Deal +(Stack consumed x 3)% damage
[EndSkill] If target is defeated, regain half of [BlackTearsAlly] consumed by this Skill
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If this Coin consumed [SwordCutwithTear], Reuse Coin once (once per turn)

text.name: Arcana: Tear and Pierce
text.desc:
Final Power +1 for every 3 [Sinking] on target (max 4)
[WhenUse] Lose 15 SP
[WhenUse] At 10+ [BlackTearsAlly], consume up to 20 [BlackTearsAlly]
- Deal +(Stack consumed x 3)% damage
- Base Power +1 for every 5 Stack consumed
[EndSkill] If target is defeated, regain half of [BlackTearsAlly] consumed by this Skill
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If this Coin consumed [SwordCutwithTear], Reuse Coin once (once per turn)

text.name: The Knight's Faith
text.desc:
[CanDuelGuard]
[StartBattle] Gain Shield equal to (SP / 5)% of this unit's max HP (once per turn)
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [BlackTearsAlly] (2 times per turn)
[EndBattle] At less than 3 [SwordCutwithTear], lose 15 SP and gain 1 [SwordCutwithTear] (once per turn)
- If this unit has [SwordCutwithTear], lose ([SwordCutwithTear] Stack x 15) more SP

text.name: The Knight's Faith
text.desc:
[CanDuelGuard]
[StartBattle] Coin Power +1 for every 2 [ProtectiveSword] (max 2)
[StartBattle] Gain Shield equal to (SP / 3)% of this unit's max HP (once per turn)
[WhenUse] Gain 5 [BlackTearsAlly] (2 times per turn)
[EndBattle] At less than 3 [SwordCutwithTear], lose 15 SP to gain 1 [SwordCutwithTear] (once per turn)
- If this unit has [SwordCutwithTear], lose ([SwordCutwithTear] Stack x 15) more SP

text.name: Weathered Pride
text.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [BlackTearsAlly] (2 times per turn)
[EndBattle] At less than 3 [SwordCutwithTear], lose 15 SP and gain 1 [SwordCutwithTear] (once per turn)
- If this unit has [SwordCutwithTear], lose ([SwordCutwithTear] Stack x 15) more SP

text.name: Weathered Pride
text.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[StartBattle] Final Power +1 for every 2 [PenetratingSword] (max 2)
[WhenUse] Gain 5 [BlackTearsAlly] (2 times per turn)
[EndBattle] At less than 3 [SwordCutwithTear], lose 15 SP and gain 1 [SwordCutwithTear] (once per turn)
- If this unit has [SwordCutwithTear], lose ([SwordCutwithTear] Stack x 15) more SP

1091331.name: For All Those Who Despair...
1091331.desc:
Combat Start: applies to the ally with the earliest Deployment order

At -15 or less SP, +1 Final Power to Minus Coin Skills
At -30 or less SP, +15% damage and +1 Final Power to Minus Coin Skills instead

1091301.name: Magical Girl of Justice / Knight of Despair
1091301.desc:
When in [BlessingAlly] state...
- Take -(SP / 2)% HP damage from attacks (max 20%)

When in [DespairAlly] state...
- Deal +(-SP/2)% damage with Base Skills (max 20%)

1091302.name: The Sword Sharpened with Tears - !ALERT: E.G.O GEAR SYNC THRESHOLD EXCEEDED!
1091302.desc:
Turn Start: at 0 or higher SP, gain [BlessingAlly]
- Uses Plus Coin Skills as Base Skills

Turn Start: at less than 0 SP, gain [DespairAlly]
- Uses Minus Coin Skills as Base Skills

When gaining [Charge] Count, gain [BlackTearsAlly] instead
- [BlackTearsAlly] is unaffected by [Charge] Potency

1091303.name: Whispers of the Betrayed Knight
1091303.desc:
This unit's SP does not drop below -40 from the following effects:
- SP loss effects on this unit's Base Skills
- SP loss effects from allied units' Support Passives
- SP loss effects from [SwordCutwithTear]
- SP loss effects from ally death in this unit's 'Base factors decreasing Sanity'

In an Encounter, when this unit takes damage that brings its SP to -45, maintain this unit's SP at -44 for that turn (once per Encounter)
(※ This applies only to SP damages; it does not apply to SP changes or SP consuming abilities like using E.G.O Skills)

1091304.name: Break, Tear, and Pierce
1091304.desc:
If this unit has [PenetratingSword]: before hitting an enemy with a Base Attack Skill, consume 1 [PenetratingSword] to inflict 1 [Sinking]
- If this unit has 2+ [PenetratingSword] before this turn's final Base Attack Skill's final Coin hits, consume all of it instead to inflict it as [Sinking]

If this unit has 3 [SwordCutwithTear]: before hitting an enemy with the final Coin of a Base Attack Skill, consume all [SwordCutwithTear] to inflict 3 [Sinking] and +3 [Sinking] Count, and deal +50% damage with that Coin
- If this effect activated, reset to 0 SP if this unit has less than 0 SP at Turn End. (when in Panic or 'E.G.O Corrosion', recover) Then, heal 30 SP

1091311.name: Magical Girl of Justice / Knight of Despair
1091311.desc:
When in [BlessingAlly] state...
- Take -(SP / 2)% HP damage from attacks (max 20%)
- Combat Start: at 3+ [ProtectiveSword], gain 1 [Protection]
- Combat Start: at 5 [ProtectiveSword], gain 2 [Protection] and 1 [ParryingResultUp] instead

When in [DespairAlly] state...
- Deal +(-SP/2)% damage with Base Skills (max 20%)
- Combat Start: at 3+ [PenetratingSword] gain 1 [AttackDmgUp]
- Combat Start: at 5 [PenetratingSword], gain 2 [AttackDmgUp] and 1 [ResultEnhancement] instead

1091321.name: For All Those Who Despair...
1091321.desc:
Combat Start: applies to the ally with the earliest Deployment order

At -15 or less SP, +1 Final Power to Minus Coin Skills

notes.short: Uses plus coins at 0+ SP and minus coins at negative SP. Positive SP mode is more defensive with higher max clashing. Negative SP mode is more offensive with higher max damage. Defend to give her a stacking buff to passively lose SP every turn, forcing her into negative SP, but also increasing damage and Power. Cannot drop below -40 SP due to the identity's own effects, and has protection from SP damage bringing her to -45 once per encounter. At 3 stacks of the buff, consume the buff to deal more damage and inflict more {status:Sinking} next turn. Gains sword buffs every turn depending on how far her SP is from 0, increasing the Power and effects on her skills.
notes.full:
Every turn start, she checks her SP. At 0+ SP, she gains {status:BlessingAlly} triggering her positive SP mode for the turn. At less than 0, SP she gains {status:DespairAlly} triggering her negative SP mode for the turn. All skills in both modes do roughly the same thing, but with slightly different numbers. Generally speaking, her positive SP mode is more defensive giving her damage mitigation and having slightly more consistent clashing (slightly higher maximum coin values and 45 SP cap), while her negative SP mode is more offensive giving her bonus damage at the cost of less consistent clashing (slightly lower maximum coin values and -40 SP cap) and the inability to use E.G.Os without corroding.

In addition to her positive/negative SP modes, she also uses a Unique Charge {status:BlackTearsAlly} which is generated with her S1, S2, and defense skills and from a buff to be mentioned later, then consumed by her S2 for more damage and her S3 for damage and Base Power. She typically generates more than enough for her skills without too much monitoring, just know that it's mainly consumed by the S3

. It is best to keep her as far from 0 SP as possible at all times because both modes gain buffs that are stronger the further her SP is from 0.

At positive SP she gains {status:ProtectiveSword} increasing her Clash Power, {status:BlackTearsAlly} generation, and {status:Sinking} application on her S3. She also applies {status:Sinking} Potency on clashes and whenever she's hit. If her passive is active, she gains more damage mitigation the higher her SP is and at 40+ gains an additional {status:ParryingResultUp}.

At negative SP she gains {status:PenetratingSword} increasing her {status:BlackTearsAlly} generation and applying additional {status:Sinking} on her hits. She also applies {status:Sinking} Count on clashes and on hitting the enemy. If her passive is active, she gains more damage the lower her SP is and at -40 gains an additional {status:ResultEnhancement}.

Using her defense skill in either mode gives her a stack of {status:SwordCutwithTear}. This buff gives her 5 {status:BlackTearsAlly} per turn (10 at 3 stacks), bonus damage per stack, and an additional {status:ParryingResultUp} at positive SP and {status:PenetrateResultUp} at negative SP, but it drains her SP every turn, eventually forcing her into her negative SP mode. At 3 stacks, her next skill's final coin will consume all 3 stacks to inflict additional {status:Sinking} and damage, then bring her back up to 30SP. If this was with her negative SP mode S3, it regains a Coin Reuse.

Her SP cannot go below than -40 using her own effects (SP loss from skills or {status:SwordCutwithTear}) or from allies, but it can still drop below -40 from SP reducing effects from enemies or from E.G.O usage. She has a one time protection from hitting -45 SP every encounter, but it only works against SP damage effects from enemies.
